speaker: Ming Johanson
title: What to do with our unconscious bias.
description:
Upgrade your skills on how to identify your own unconscious bias, when to challenge it, how to communicate it and best deal with the environment that doesn't match your perfect world scenario.

A journey into a critical and hysterical investigation of the speakers own personal unconscious bias across childhood experiences, education and careers.

You don’t need to be a manager help create safe space to question bias in your organisation.
